pr_title: Fix syntax in example page that is incompatible with IE11
Check className has a truthy value before trying anything else
Mark package as side effects free
Fix errors when embedding on Pastel (usepastel.com)
Create monorepo and add documentation website
Add jump parameter to scrollTo, scrollPrev and scrollNext
Don't remove offset from target when `loop:false`.
Fix className attribute in React example section
Allow to assign slide nodes as slots within a web component using shadow DOM
Break the dragging animation if the slide index is equal to 0 or {max}
Migrate from Algolia DocSearch v2 --> v3
WheelGestures Plugin: Add CDN / UMD info to install section
Update wheel gestures plugin docs page
Add a hint for flexbox and autoheight compatability
Docs: Add target option (Wheel Gestures Plugin)
Add prevent click when scrolling plugin
Docs: improve explanation of the speed option
Vue Package: fixed types for emblaApi #366
chore(docs): set custom root node for autoplay
chore: Add React ^16.8 and ^17 to peer deps.
Migrate to the latest Gatsby version
Dragging not working well in Firefox for desktop
Handle click prevention on drag automatically
Add `emblaApi` as a first parameter to event listeners
Prepare sandbox compilation for Vue and Svelte
Adding a class only to the snapped slide
Rewrite tests so they test the final product instead of isolated components
Fix scrollTo signature on exported type
Auto generate contributors in README files
Fix old browsers not support add event to MediaQueryList
Support using tab(focus) to select and navigate carousel
Use `onBeforeUnmount` instead of `onUnmounted` to separate embla DOM cleanup from Vue Reactivity
Improve bug report and feature request templates
Move Nodenext support script to Rollup build end hook
Add TypeScript usage examples to the docs
Make reading element dimensions work regardless of transforms
Expose the state for autoplay and events to listen to it
[Bug]: Render when slides are wider than view size
[Bug]: Infinite Scroll Example does not settle when sdditional slides where added
[Bug]: Direction rtl reverses y axis direction
[Feat]: Add RTL case for slide gaps via CSS in docs
[Feat]: Simplify sandbox generation and improve examples
Fixing a typo in the documentation
[Bug]: Autoplay and AutoScroll not destroyed properly
[Feat]: API section in docs - Add code examples for all wrappers
[Bug]: Synced tabs doesn't always restore scroll position when selected tab changes
[Bug]: Extra snapList point on some cases
[Feat]: For Vue docs, use a more common SFC format
fix(build): update package.json files with correct "module" field
[Feat]: Add Pull Request template and discussion templates for all categories
Added `embla-carousel` as a dependency for CodeSandbox template
[Bug]: Fade plugin has wrong peer dependency version
chore(docs): fix missing sandbox dependency and add vanilla examples
Add better error message for missing mocks
[Bug]: Autoplay fast scroll when opened in a new tab
[Bug]: Jitter on resize when not on first image
[Bug]: Add interpolation to fixed time step to improve animation smoothness
refactor(vue): optimize reactivity handling and reduce bundle size
[Bug]: Add nodenext compatibility for ESM imports
embla-carousel-auto-height | Start using ResizeObserver for height calculations
[Bug]: Animation is not behaving consistently on higher refresh rates like 120Hz and up
[Feat]: Add react v19 to peer deps
[Bug]: TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'map') in AutoHeight
[Feat]: Upgrade deprecated Node version for GitHub actions
[Bug]: `useEmblaCarousel` initializes Embla with stale options in certain cases
[Bug]: Offset by 1 issue for canScrollNext when tab size has fractional width
[Feat]: Add direction parameter to scrollToSnap & scrollToSlide
[Feat]: Rename snap index options and methods to achieve consistent naming
[Feat]: Scroll to snap that holds a specific slide
[Feat]: Refactor watch options to watch handlers
[Bug]: RangeError Maximum call stack size exceeded
[Feat]: Autoplay - Delay between transitions per slide + Possibility to create a progress bar

[Feat]: Give animation variables more descriptive names and round rendered position
